description: Quote form collects name email SSN DOB address for insurance quotes
Quote calculation engine stores customer profiles and risk scores
Automated underwriting decisions based on credit and health data
PostgreSQL storing customer records with PII and PHI
Policy documents and premium payment records
Payment processing and premium collection via Stripe
Experian credit check integration for underwriting
HL7 FHIR integration for medical history retrieval
ML model for fraud detection on claims
